title: Fps drop and High CPU usage
body:
Hi everyone,
im playing on my laptop since few days, its a dell xps 17 l704x with an i5-2430M @2.40GHz ; 4 gb ram and a gt 550m 1go.
When im at spawn i have 60 fps in medium settings and more than 110 in low settings. When it come to fight or to watch a lot of minions on a lane i have a big drop of fps it falls to 10-15 fps.
My brother is also playing with me on another computer, this one have an AMD Athlon II X2 215 2.70GHz with an ATI Radeon 3000 Graphics and 3gb ram and he have no problem, no lags or anything else in low quality.
I also noticed that while playing lol my CPU usage is very high arround 100%. I can't understand how can his computer run better lol than me, i can play bf3, saints row, just cause and other many games with my GPU and he cant even run these so how can't my laptop run properly lol.

replies.body: The issue you're having could be due to a hardware or software problem, but can also be a corruption with game files.  Based on your information, specifically your CPU usage, there might be too many programs running in your background that's bloating your computer as well.  As a first step, I recommend going over our [FPS Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot this.  The instructions there should get you fixed up, but hit me up if your issue persists.

Hi,
thanks for your answer.
I checked everything, my drivers are up to date, my in game settings are set on low (no im not playing with a chipset lol), windows is set on High Performance, i cheked registery with Ccleaner, i defragmented my hard drive and i still have the same issue. In laning phase when im alone i have more than 60 fps but when it comes to fight or farm it suddently drop to 13. Everytime i check my UC, it is veery high almost 100% then it decrease to 25%. It looks like my uc is making fun of me ....
Im scaning my pc with an anti malware program, then i will repair league of legend i hope it works.

I still have that shity issue, i don't understand why is my cpu at 100% when im fighting or farming. I checked for virus or malware but my pc is clean. I have windows 7. I can't play like this 13 fps during everyfight while my brother have 40 with a chipset ...
I need help guys
